what i do

I'm Midhun Jose, front end developer and interface designer based in india. Currently i am working for tcoffee.I love to experiment with graphics and interactivity. Take a look at some of my favorite projects

my works

    • About me

    My work consists of a healthy mix of useful interface libraries, pointless animations and minimalist games.Most of my projects are released open source so you can freely modify or improve on them.
